channel.title: Ideas on Amateur Hour
channel.description: Recent content in Ideas on Amateur Hour

item.title: Reflections on NIPS (Part 2)
item.description: One nice thing about going to NIPS is how intellectual stimulating it was. I’ve spent most of the past few months thinking about other things, so being immersed into the machine learning world again was definitely reinvigorating. Before the intellectual high fades, I thought I’d sketch out the most interesting puzzles that I’m thinking about thanks to NIPS. Learning Structure Humans can learn from an incredibly small amount of data.
